entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Temiscouata
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening then to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
